1: <pb/>An Isaías tic, yunnal in Amoz. 'Ix alx jun tzo'n̈ paxti tic 'ayin yuj tas 'oj jawc 'a yib'n̈ eb' 'aj Judá yet' eb' 'aj Jerusalén, atn 'a yic x'ec' ewin tic reyl 'a Judá: Ozías, Jotam, Acaz yet' pax Ezequías, ata 'ix yal Jehová 'ixtic:
2: <pb/><t>Ex 'aj satcha'an̈ yet' ex 'aj sat lum tic, 'ab'ec. A eb' 'anma tic, xin c'uytzej eb' 'a yic yune'al masnto x'och yip eb', palta ax x'aji, 'ix meltzj 'och eb' 'ajc'ojlal 'ayin.</t>
3: <t>A no wacax yojc no yajal, yet' no b'uru yojc no 'aj tz'ajx wa yuj mach 'ay yico'. Palta ax in chon̈b' Israel, toxn man̈ jac tznachj 'el yu'uj toto wico', 'icha to may xon snab'en, xchi.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ex wit chon̈ab', caw wal 'ajmul ex, an̈j maysch'olnil tze b'o 'icha ya'jnac eb' qui mam quichmec, an̈j tu tze b'o'o. Xeyi'n 'el e b'a 'a stz'ey Jehová, xeyactn can qui Diosal To Cojxni.</t>
5: <t>¿Tas yuj an̈ja e nib'n eyi' cot yailal 'a quib'an̈? ¿Tom tze nib'j an̈ja eyec' 'a yib'an̈? Nac cot nab'an tas yailal 'ix 'ec' 'a quib'n̈ec yuj Dios. Yuj cha, lajn on̈c 'icha junc 'anma to 'ay q'ue yab'il 'a sjolom, ax sniwnal 'ipn yel yip.</t>
6: <t>'Icha to man̈x 'a xon jac sjacnil 'a sniwnal yuj syailal, tzchaj 'el 'a yoc masnto tzq'ue'ch 'a sjolom. 'Ay 'elnc sat, 'ay ton̈j malnac, 'ay pax wan sc'a'i. May pax yan̈l tzya'chi, may mach tz'a'n 'och jac spichl sat, may pax jac aceite tzya'ch 'a 'a yic tzpacb'i, 'ixta on̈ 'ajec.</t>
7: <pb/><t>A qui nacion̈ec tic, tox xcan 'a cusltaquil, 'ayx 'och sc'a'l qui chon̈b'ec. Ax smasnil sat cawb'enec, q'ueln on̈ wal 'ochi sc'uxn eb' chuc chon̈b'al. Xlajw can 'ejm smasnil yuj eb', cusltac xoj yilx x'ajcni.</t>
8: <t>A chon̈b' Sión, 'ix can sch'ocj 'icha junc yune pat yic eb' tan̈m uva, mto 'icha jac yen̈l eb' tan̈m melón yic tzlajw smolb'tzax te', mto 'icha pax tzyac' junc chon̈b' oyn 'och eb' 'ajc'ojl 'a 'a, yic tzya'n lajwc 'el eb'.</t>
9: <t>A Jehová tztac' yuj smasnil, 'ix 'el 'a sc'ojol, on̈ yactj can jaywn̈ on̈c tic. Q'uinloc ma'ay, 'icha am 'ajnc satl Sodoma yet' Gomorra, 'ixta on̈ 'ajec.</t>
10: <t>Ex 'aj Jerusalén lajn ex yet' eb' eyajlil, 'icha wal eb' 'aj Sodoma yet' eb' 'aj Gomorra 'ixta 'ex. 'Ab'ec, a jun tzo'n̈ paxti tic, cuynb'il xyac' Jehová qui Diosalec.</t>
11: <t>'Ix yal Jehová 'ixtic: A jun tzo'n̈ e xajmb'al tzjaw ch'ucn 'a wojltac, man̈x 'a tz'och wu'uj. 'Ix q'ue syoch'l no calnelu tzeyac' xajmb'al-l 'ayin, yet' xepual no noc' caw b'aq'uech. Man̈xtzac in nib'j schic'l no quelm wacax mto yic no mam calnelu yet' yic no chiwo.</t>
12: <t>¿Mach xc'ann jun tzo'n̈ chi 'ayex, yuj cha, tzex comn jaw 'a wojltac yet'oc? Ax tz'aji tze comn te'n yamq'uil sti watut.</t>
13: <t>Man̈x eyi' cot jun tzo'n̈ eyofrenda cha, yujto man̈x 'a tas tzb'o yu'uj. A incienso tze n̈usu, man̈xtzac schaj in c'ojol. Ax jun tzo'n̈ e q'uin̈ tzlaj e na 'a yic tzpac' 'uj yet' 'a sc'ul 'iljelal, caw tzex tzalj cob' eyamn e b'a 'a jun tzo'n̈ eyamnil cha, palta an xo tic, man̈xtzac ex in nib'j wil yet' e q'uin̈ cha, yujto maysch'olnil tas tze b'o'o.</t>
14: <t>Caw tzex in chacl yet' jun tzo'n̈ e q'uin̈ 'a yic tzpac' 'uj, yet' jun tzo'n̈ xo eyamnil. Man̈xtzac ex in nib'j wil yet' jun tzo'n̈ cha, yujto xyoch'b' c'och wu'uj.</t>
15: <t>A yic tzcob' ex leslwi, tzlaj cob' e mojchan̈ e c'ab' 'ayin, palta 'oj in c'ub'c 'el in sat 'ayex. Wach'xam cob' niwn tas tzeyal 'a e lesl cha, ma'oj wab'i', yujto milm ex cham 'anma'.</t>
16: <t>Ax ticnec jun, 'ijec 'el jun tzo'n̈ maysch'olnil chi 'ayex, 'actjec e b'oni, tzeyi'n 'el e b'a 'a scal.</t>
17: <t>Cuyc e b'a e b'on swach'il, a cab' stojlal tze sayq'ui, colwjan̈c 'a eb' 'anma tz'ixtxi, b'oc yaj eb' meb'a 'unin, colwjan̈c 'a eb' 'ix 'ix chamnc yichmil, xchi Dios.</t>
18: <pb/><t>Xlajw cha, xyaln pax Jehová 'ixtic: An Jehová in, an tzwala. Cotn̈ec, b'ocyaj e b'a. Wach'xam a 'e mul caw wal tu eyilx yu'uj, palta 'oj ex in b'icli, ax e sacb' can 'icha yilx q'uen sacb'acum. Toxn̈ej lajn eyilx yuj e mul chi 'icha junc te q'uic'mucnac nip matz 'el yan̈il, palta 'oj ex wac' b'icxc 'eli, ax e sacb' can 'icha yilx sac lana.</t>
19: <t>Toto tze chaj eyab'i', 'oj e c'ux wal tas wach' tz'el-l 'a sat lum lum tic;</t>
20: <t>palta toto an̈ja tenmtac tzeyutj e b'a, 'oj e cham 'a scal 'owl 'oj wa' cot 'a eyib'an̈, xchi.</t>
21: <t>Ex 'aj Jerusalén, caw te'n eyaj 'a yic yalan̈, palta ax ticnec, 'icha wal junc 'ix 'ajmul 'ix, 'ixta ex 'ajcn 'a in sat. Caw wach' e b'eyb'al 'a pecti cha, tojl e nab'en, palta ax ticnec, milm ex cham 'anma'.</t>
22: <t>A 'a yic yaln̈ cha, 'icha q'uen plata 'ixta eyilxi, palta ax ticnec, 'icha xoj c'alem eyilx paxi. 'Icha te yal uva caw wach' 'ixta eyilx xoni, palta ax ticnec, lajn xoj eyilx 'icha yal uva caln yaj yet' a'.</t>
23: <t>A eb' eyajlil caw wal pit eb', yitb'eym sb'a eb' yet' eb' 'elc'um. Caw wal tzalj eb' yet' q'uen c'ultac tumin, tzlaj snib'nc eb' to 'ay tas tzlaj siyxc 'a 'a. Matz nib'j eb' tzlaj sb'o yaj eb' meb'a 'unin, yet' eb' 'ix 'ix chamnc yichmil.</t>
24: <t>Yuj cha, an Jehová in tztac' wuj smasnil, Syajlil in chon̈b' Israel, an tzwal 'ixtic: Ax xo 'ajc'ojl eyajch 'ayin. Wal in b'on yaj in b'a eyet' tic, 'oj in pac in b'a 'ayex.</t>
25: <t>'Oj ex wac' cuenta yet' yailal, 'icha to 'oj wa'cn tz'a e paltail cha, ax wi'n 'el smasnil e mul 'aych 'a eyib'n̈ cha.</t>
26: <t>Ax wa'n pax 'och eb' juez tojl snab'en 'a e cal jun 'ejm xo, yet' eb' 'a'm nab'en yaj 'a e cal 'icha xon eyaj 'a yic pecti'. Ax yajx sb'ic jun chon̈b' tic, Tojol, Yiclum.</t>
27: <t>Yuj stojlal in nab'en, ax in coln can 'el eb' 'aj Sión, atn eb' 'oj sna sb'a sc'ojol,</t>
28: <t>palta ax eb' tenmtac, eb' 'ajmul yet' eb' tzin 'actn cani, 'oj cham pax eb'.</t>
29: <t>'Ixta to b'i'an ax eyecn q'uixwc e b'a, yujto xlaj eyal e b'a 'a yechl jun tzo'n̈ comn dios, xeyi'n 'ejm e b'a 'a eb' te niwc mach' 'ay 'a calte'.</t>
30: <t>'Icha wal tz'aj spucl xil te mach' chi 'a sc'ab', yic man̈x 'a xon jac n̈ab' tz'em 'a yib'n̈ te', 'ixta wal 'oj eyaji.</t>
31: <t>A junc 'anma caw te'n yaj 'a tzyutj snani, 'icha xoj te 'ac 'ixta 'oj 'ajoc; ax jun tzo'n̈ yechl xlaj sb'o cha, 'oj 'och n̈ilnjoc sc'aq'uil, lajn 'oj 'aj scan sc'ac'l eb' 'a schac'ajil, man̈x 'a mach 'oj stac' stupn jun c'ac' cha, xchi Dios.</t>
